snatools 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Reference

snatools

snatools

snatools: An R toolkit to bridge graph classes and streamline network analytic workflows.

Bringing Closure to Network Analysis Frameworks

A graph data object that bridges the major frameworks of R’s network analysis ecosystem.

as_bridge_net() print(<bridge_net>)

A data structure that effectively bridges igraph and network objects.

Class Conversion

Safely convert objects between common network classes.

as_igraph() as.igraph(<bridge_net>) as.igraph(<network>)

Conversion to igraph objects.

as_network() as.network(<bridge_net>) as.network(<igraph>)

Conversion to network objects.

Metrics

Additional statistics equipped with methods for all objects.

ei_index() print(<ei_index_global>) sna_plot(<ei_index_global>)

E-I Index

Vertex Attributes

Operations targeting vertex attributes.

vrt_attr_names()

Extract a graph objects's vertex attribute names.

vrt_get_attr() vrt_get_names()

Extract a specific vertex attribute.

vrt_to_df()

Extract all vertex attributes as a data frame.

vrt_delete_attr()

Delete Vertex Attributes

vrt_filter() vrt_filter_se()

Filter vertices by their attributes.

Edge Attributes

Operations targeting edge attributes.

edg_attr_names()

Extract a graph objects's edge attribute names.

edg_get_attr()

Extract a specific edge attribute.

edg_to_df() print(<edge_data_frame>)

Extract all edge attributes as a data frame.

edg_delete_attr()

Delete Edge Attributes

edg_filter() edg_filter_se()

Filter edges by their attributes.

Network Attributes

net_attr_names()

Extract non-structural network attribute names.

net_get_attr()

Extract a specific, non-strucural network attribute.

net_attrs_to_list()

Extract all non-structural network attributes as a named list.

Structural Metadata

Operations targeting graph-level attributes and metadata.

net_is_directed()

Are a network's edges directed or undirected?

net_is_multiplex()

Is a graph object multiplex?

net_is_bipartite()

Is a graph object bipartite?

net_count_vertices()

Count the number of vertices present in a graph object.

net_count_edges()

Count the number of edges present in a graph object.

net_count_actors()

Count the number of vertices belonging to the actor mode of a bipartite graph object.

net_has_loops()

Does a graph object contain loops?

net_has_isolates()

Does a graph object contain isolates?

Representations

Construct and test various network representations.

rep_as_edgelist() is_edgelist() print(<edgelist>) as.matrix(<edgelist>) as.data.frame(<edgelist>)

Construct a graph object's edgelist representation

rep_as_adj_matrix() print(<adj_matrix>)

Construct a graph object's adjacency matrix representation.

rep_as_mixing_matrix() is_mixing_matrix() print(<mixing_matrix>) as.matrix(<mixing_matrix>) as.data.frame(<mixing_matrix>)

Construct a graph object's mixing matrix.
